subject: Golf
United States Women's Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Inbee Park, who could sweep this season’s L.P.G.A. majors, follows the path set by the South Korean Ok-Hee Ku in 1988.
snippet: Inbee Park, who could sweep this season’s L.P.G.A. majors, follows the path set by the South Korean Ok-Hee Ku in 1988.
